channel.title: Greedy on Ting-Hsuan Lin
channel.description: Recent content in Greedy on Ting-Hsuan Lin

item.title: Gas Station
item.description: Gas Station LeetCode #134 Description There are N gas stations along a circular route, where the amount of gas at station i is gas[i]. You have a car with an unlimited gas tank and it costs cost[i] of gas to travel from station i to its next station (i+1). You begin the journey with an empty tank at one of the gas stations. Return the starting gas station’s index if you can travel around the circuit once, otherwise return -1.

item.title: Remove K Digits
item.description: Remove K Digits LeetCode #402 Description Given a non-negative integer num represented as a string, remove k digits from the number so that the new number is the smallest possible. Note: The length of num is less than 10002 and will be â‰¥ k. The given num does not contain any leading zero. Example 1: Input: num = "1432219", k = 3 Output: "1219" Explanation: Remove the three digits 4, 3, and 2 to form the new number 1219 which is the smallest.
